metadata.title: TACTICAL RESEARCH TR Men's JUNGLE RUNNER TR900 Lightweight Hot Weather Panama Boot
features: Rappelling bars & 360° stitching around outsole extend wear
UPPER: Smooth, full-grain cattlehide leather & nylon fabric
MIDSOLE: Highly cushioned, shock absorbent midsole
OUTSOLE: Exclusive long-wearing Panama rubber outsole is non-marking, oil & slip resistant
INSOLE: Single density molded removable insert
Padded collar for added comfort. Medial side drainage vents
Low profile, closed lacing hardware to prevent snags
Double & triple stitched seams for enhanced durability
description: Tactical Research by Belleville introduces the new Jungle Runner boot. Borrowing the best features of Vietnam Era jungle boots, the TR900 has key performance characteristics that include the highly sought Panama outsole with added rappelling bars and 360° stitching around outsole to extend wear. Additionally, new performance features such as improved drainage make the TR900 yet another advanced warfighter boot.
metadata.details: {"Item model number": "TR900", "Department": "Mens", "Date First Available": "November 17, 2015", "Manufacturer": "Belleville Shoe Mfg. Company"}
